title: Allow importing multi-file GGUF models
summary:
### What is the issue?

Currently Ollama can [import GGUF files](https://github.com/ollama/ollama/blob/main/docs/import.md). However, larger models are sometimes split into separate files. Ollama should support loading multiple GGUF files similar to loading safetensor files.


### OS

_No response_

title: [PR] Feature/chroma memory service
summary:
**Problem:**
The current `InMemoryMemoryService` uses simple keyword matching to search agent memories. This means:
- Synonyms don't work ("happy" won't match "joyful")
- Context is lost (keyword matching ignores semantic meaning)
- No persistence (all memories are lost on restart)

title: [PR] Add multi-provider LLM backend
summary:
This pull request introduces a multi-provider backend for Large Language Models (LLMs), allowing users to select and configure providers beyond the existing Ollama integration. This includes support for OpenAI, Anthropic, Google Gemini, and OpenRouter.

The implementation includes:
- **New Types and

title: [PR] evaluation framework

## Added
* `assays` pytest plugin

title: [PR] Adds TTS provider support
summary:
Integrates text-to-speech providers into the synthesizer module:

- Implements multi-provider TTS API abstraction layer
- Adds comprehensive error handling for text synthesis
- Includes AWS Polly and other providers via boto3 integration
- Updates configuration system with .keys support

Improves au

title: Refactor LLM backends to use LiteLLM + Instructor for vendor-agnostic provider support
summary:
## Overview

Replace the current OpenAI-only LLM integration with **LiteLLM + Instructor** to achieve:

1. **No vendor lock-in** - Support 100+ LLM providers through a unified API
2. **Easy configurability** - Switch providers via configuration, not code changes
3. **Validated structured outputs** -

title: [PR] Implement Agent Manager with React frontend, Rust core, and Python services
summary:
First version of the Ollama Agent Workspace - a system giving local AI models persistent memory and file management capabilities.

## Architecture

- **Frontend** (React/TypeScript/Tailwind): Chat-first interface with tool activity transparency, file browser, timeline, and maintenance insights panel
